channel.title: Biomechanics on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Biomechanics on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A robot walks on water thanks to evolution’s solution
item.description: A structure like those found on water striders’ legs keeps a robot out of the water.

item.title: New adhesive surface modeled on a remora works underwater
item.description: It was tested for its ability to adhere to the inside of the digestive tract.

item.title: For giant carnivorous dinosaurs, big size didn’t mean a big bite
item.description: The biomechanics of dinosaur skulls say T. rex was the king of bite force.
